page.title: 11CHILDRENS GAMES W.READING
page.content: Times don't change or do they?The technological age making its mark everywhere has had its impact on childrens games.Hand held computor games compete with their home equi valents;mini munchman being a popular example,its aim for the operator to find a way through a maze,eating fruit and power pills avoiding the ghosts. the player is given 4 lives in which to achieve the highest score.A solitary game and exciting but its popularity has not yet usurped the long lived game of tag.The rules vary but the essence is the same;run or be caught.Football persists as a favourite whilst marbles and skipping continue as seasonal alternatives.The most popular game amongst todays junior schoolchildren is 4040,a modified version of the all time fav ourite-hide and seek.
